name.richardson.james.bukkit.utilities.permissions

Interface PermissionsHolder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Command
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PluginCommand, SkeletonPlugin

    public interface PermissionsHolder
    A interface representing methods used when a class implements Permissions. This should usually be used when a class has Permissions that restrict what players can do. For example a Command would implement Permissions to ensure that only certain players can use certain commands or options within it. A plugin would also implement permissions to provide a shortcut for Commands to register new permissions and to create wildcarded shortcuts for example.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets a permission from the class's internal list.
      Permission getPermission(String path)
      Gets a registered permission.
      List<Permission> getPermissions()
      Gets the full list of permissions associated with this class

        void addPermission(Permission permission)
        Registers a permission and adds it to the class's internal list.
        Parameters:
        permission - the new permission to add.

      • getPermission

        Permission getPermission(int index)
        Gets a permission from the class's internal list.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the permission
        Returns:
        the permission or null if no such permission exists.

      • getPermission

        Permission getPermission(String path)
        Gets a registered permission.
        Parameters:
        path - the node path of the permission sought.
        Returns:
        the permission or null if no permission could be found.

      • getPermissions

        List<Permission> getPermissions()
        Gets the full list of permissions associated with this class
        Returns:
        the permissions
